name: Idle Match
description:
That's right, it's a match 3 idle mashup! The two most hated genres now in one solid form. 

Click, drag, and release to swap gems (think mobile swipe)

Swap gems until you earn enough sweet moolah for them to swap themselves!

Background:

I made this game in a week as an experiment. I thought it would be amusing to mashup these two genres; two genres the gaming community seems to abhor, despite (or perhaps because of) their commercial success.
